deposit_asset(address,uint256,bytes32).details: MUST emit Asset_Deposited if successfulERC20 approve function should be run before running this

params.amount: Amount of tokens to be deposited into Vega
params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token
params.vega_public_key: Target Vega public key to be credited with this deposit

params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token

returns._0: Lifetime limit for the given asset

returns._0: The ERC20 token contract address for a given Vega Asset ID

returns._0: The assigned Vega Asset ID for given ERC20 token

params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token

global_resume(uint256,bytes).details: bridge must be stoppedMUST emit Bridge_Resumed if successful

params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order

global_stop(uint256,bytes).details: bridge must not be stopped alreadyMUST emit Bridge_Stopped if successful

params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order

params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token
Contract address for given ERC20 token
params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order
params.vega_asset_id: Vega-generated asset ID for internal use in Vega Core
params.withdraw_threshold: Amount at which the withdraw delay goes into effect *RESTRICTION FEATURE*

params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token
params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection

params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token
params.lifetime_limit: Deposit limit for a given ethereum address
params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order

params.delay: Amount of time to delay a withdrawal
params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order

params.amount: Amount of ERC20 tokens to withdraw
params.asset_source: Contract address for given ERC20 token
params.creation: Timestamp of when requestion was created *RESTRICTION FEATURE*
params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order
params.target: Target Ethereum address to receive withdrawn ERC20 tokens

deposit_asset(address,uint256,bytes32).notice: This function allows a user to deposit given ERC20 tokens into VegaERC20 approve function should be run before running this

exempt_depositor().notice: this function allows the exemption_lister to exempt a depositor from the deposit limitsthis feature is specifically for liquidity and rewards providers

get_asset_deposit_lifetime_limit(address.notice: This view returns the lifetime deposit limit for the given asset

get_withdraw_threshold(address).notice: This view returns the given token's withdraw threshold above which the withdraw delay goes into effect

global_resume(uint256,bytes).notice: This function resumes bridge operations from the stopped state

global_stop(uint256,bytes).notice: This function triggers the global bridge stop that halts all withdrawals and deposits until it is resumed

is_asset_listed(address).notice: This view returns true if the given ERC20 token contract has been listed valid for deposit

is_exempt_depositor(address).notice: this view returns true if the given despoitor address has been exempted from deposit limits

list_asset(address,bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: This function lists the given ERC20 token contract as valid for deposit to this bridgeSee MultisigControl for more about signatures

remove_asset(address,uint256,bytes).notice: This function removes from listing the given ERC20 token contract. This marks the token as invalid for deposit to this bridgeSee MultisigControl for more about signatures

revoke_exempt_depositor().notice: this function allows the exemption_lister to revoke a depositor's exemption from deposit limitsthis feature is specifically for liquidity and rewards providers

set_asset_limits(address,uint256,uint256.notice: This function sets the lifetime maximum deposit for a given asset

set_withdraw_delay(uint256,uint256,bytes.notice: This function sets the withdraw delay for withdrawals over the per-asset set thresholds

withdraw_asset(address,uint256,address,u.notice: This function withdrawals assets to the target Ethereum addressSee MultisigControl for more about signatures

userdoc.notice: Implementations of this interface are used by Vega network users to deposit and withdraw ERC20 tokens to/from Vega.
